cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jugyou

sentence.kanji: 今日は日本語の授業があります。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha nihongo no jugyou ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's going to be a Japanese class today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kodomo

sentence.kanji: 電車で子供が騒いでいた。
sentence.romaji: densha de kodomo ga sawaide ita
sentence.english: Kids were making a racket in the train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boku

sentence.kanji: 僕は学生です。
sentence.romaji: boku ha gakusei desu
sentence.english: I'm a student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougyou

sentence.kanji: そこは工業都市だ。
sentence.romaji: soko ha kougyou toshi da
sentence.english: That's an industrial city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sagyou

sentence.kanji: 作業するにはもっと広いスペースが必要だ。
sentence.romaji: sagyou suru ni ha moto hiroi supe-su ga hitsuyou da
sentence.english: I need a bigger space to work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女はアメリカの企業で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha amerika no kigyou de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: She works in an American company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sangyou

sentence.kanji: 日本の自動車産業は世界的に有名だ。
sentence.romaji: nihon no jidousha sangyou ha sekaiteki ni yuumei da
sentence.english: The Japanese auto industry is famous worldwide.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futsuu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は普通の女の子だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha futsuu no onna no ko da
sentence.english: She's just a normal girl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's narabu

sentence.kanji: ここに並んでください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni narande kudasai
sentence.english: Please line up here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naraberu

sentence.kanji: 私は料理をテーブルに並べた。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryouri wo te-buru ni narabeta
sentence.english: I arranged the food on the table.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuukou

sentence.kanji: 空港までリムジンバスで行った。
sentence.romaji: kuukou made rimujin basu de ita
sentence.english: I went to the airport by shuttle bus.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minato

sentence.kanji: 港に船が着きました。
sentence.romaji: minato ni fune ga tsukimashita
sentence.english: The ship arrived at the port.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotonaru

sentence.kanji: 彼と私はいつも意見が異なる。
sentence.romaji: kare to watashi ha itsumo iken ga kotonaru
sentence.english: He and I always have different opinions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chousa

sentence.kanji: 私たちがその問題を調査しています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ga sono mondai wo chousa shite imasu
sentence.english: We're investigating that problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teikyou

sentence.kanji: 彼がパーティー会場を提供してくれました。
sentence.romaji: kare ga pa-tei- kaijou wo teikyou shite kuremashita
sentence.english: He provided us with the venue for the party.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's erabu

sentence.kanji: 良い家を選ぶのは難しい。
sentence.romaji: yoi ie wo erabu no ha muzukashii
sentence.english: It's difficult to choose a good house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senshu

sentence.kanji: 彼はプロのサッカー選手だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha puro no saka- senshu da
sentence.english: He's a professional soccer player.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soshiki

sentence.kanji: 彼はある組織のリーダーだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha aru soshiki no ri-da- da
sentence.english: He's the leader of a certain organization.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sotsugyou

sentence.kanji: 私は去年、大学を卒業した。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kyonen daigaku wo sotsugyou shita
sentence.english: I graduated from university last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyousha

sentence.kanji: 引っ越しを業者に頼んだ。
sentence.romaji: hikoshi wo gyousha ni tanonda
sentence.english: I asked a company to handle my move.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukyuu

sentence.kanji: ゴミのリサイクルが普及している。
sentence.romaji: gomi no risaikuru ga fukyuu shite iru
sentence.english: Garbage recycling has become widespread.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tasukeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は病気の犬を助けた。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha byouki no inu wo tasuketa
sentence.english: She helped a sick dog.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumitateru

sentence.kanji: 日曜日に本棚を組み立てます。
sentence.romaji: nichiyoubi ni hondana wo kumitatemasu
sentence.english: I'll set up the bookshelf on Sunday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougyou

sentence.kanji: この町では商業が盛んだ。
sentence.romaji: kono machi de ha shougyou ga sakan da
sentence.english: Business is thriving in this city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatami

sentence.kanji: そのホテルには畳の部屋がある。
sentence.romaji: sono hoteru ni ha tatami no heya ga aru
sentence.english: That hotel has tatami rooms.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatamu

sentence.kanji: 布団を畳んでください。
sentence.romaji: futon wo tatande kudasai
sentence.english: Please fold up the futon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ojiisan

sentence.kanji: 私のお祖父さんは毎日散歩します。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ojiisan ha mainichi sanpo shimasu 。
sentence.english: My grandfather takes a walk every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's obaasan

sentence.kanji: 彼女はお祖母さんと住んでいる。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha obaasan to sun deiru 。
sentence.english: She lives with her grandmother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sofu

sentence.kanji: 祖父は元気です。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha genki desu
sentence.english: My grandfather is well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sobo

sentence.kanji: 祖母は京都で生まれました。
sentence.romaji: sobo ha kyouto de umaremashita
sentence.english: My grandmother was born in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyoukai

sentence.kanji: 私はIT業界で働いています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha IT gyoukai de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: I'm working in the IT industry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zangyou

sentence.kanji: 昨日は遅くまで残業しました。
sentence.romaji: kinou ha osoku made zangyou shimashita
sentence.english: I worked overtime till late yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoutsuugo

sentence.kanji: インドでは英語は共通語だよ。
sentence.romaji: indo de ha eigo ha kyoutsuugo da yo
sentence.english: English is a common language in India.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomoni

sentence.kanji: 最後まで共にがんばりましょう。
sentence.romaji: saigo made tomoni ganbarimashou
sentence.english: Let's try our best right to the end.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoudou

sentence.kanji: 2社が共同で新製品を開発したんだ。
sentence.romaji: nisha ga kyoudou de shinseihin wo kaihatsu shita n da
sentence.english: The two companies jointly developed a new product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eigyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は営業を担当しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha eigyou wo tantou shiteimasu 。
sentence.english: He is in charge of sales.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyousanshugi

sentence.kanji: その国は共産主義の国だよ。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni ha kyousanshugi no kuni da yo
sentence.english: That country is a Communist nation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nami

sentence.kanji: 彼は並みの人間ではありません。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nami no ningen de ha arimasen
sentence.english: He's not an average man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jigyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は事業に失敗したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jigyou ni shipai shita no
sentence.english: He failed in that business.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ijou

sentence.kanji: 今年の夏は異常な暑さですね。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no natsu ha ijou na atsusa desu ne
sentence.english: This summer is exceptionally hot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isei

sentence.kanji: 息子はもう異性を意識している。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha mou isei wo ishiki shite iru
sentence.english: My son is already aware of the opposite sex.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kensa

sentence.kanji: 私は今日、目の検査を受けます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kyou me no kensa wo ukemasu
sentence.english: I will have an eye examination today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuusen

sentence.kanji: 彼の絵がコンクールに入選した。
sentence.romaji: kare no e ga konku-ru ni nyuusen shita
sentence.english: His painting won a prize at the contest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tousen

sentence.kanji: 彼は選挙に当選しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha senkyo ni tousen shimashita
sentence.english: He won the election.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sentaku

sentence.kanji: この5種類から選択できます。
sentence.romaji: kono 5 shurui kara sentaku dekimasu
sentence.english: You can select one from these five types.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikumi

sentence.kanji: この機械の仕組みは複雑だ。
sentence.romaji: kono kikai no shikumi ha fukuzatsu da
sentence.english: The mechanism of this machine is complex.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumi

sentence.kanji: 彼は1年2組の生徒です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ichinen nikumi no seito desu
sentence.english: He's a student in first grade, second class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumu

sentence.kanji: このプロジェクトで私は彼と組んでいるんだ。
sentence.romaji: kono purojiekuto de watashi ha kare to kunde iru n da
sentence.english: I am pairing up with him for this project.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumiawaseru

sentence.kanji: いろいろな花を組み合わせ花束を作りました。
sentence.romaji: iroiro na hana wo kumiawase hanataba wo tsukurimashita
sentence.english: I put many kinds of flowers together to make a bouquet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumikomu

sentence.kanji: キャンペーンに新しいイベントを組み込みました。
sentence.romaji: kyanpe-n ni atarashii ibento wo kumikomimashita
sentence.english: We introduced a new event into the campaign.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torikumu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はスペイン語に取り組んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha supeingo ni torikunde imasu
sentence.english: She's working on her Spanish.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juugyouin

sentence.kanji: 会社は従業員の数を増やす予定だ。
sentence.romaji: kaisha ha juugyouin no kazu wo fuyasu yotei da
sentence.english: The company plans to increase the number of employees.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumiai

sentence.kanji: 今日は組合の集まりがあるわ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha kumiai no atsumari ga aru wa
sentence.english: There is a union meeting today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoukyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼の会社は電力を供給しています。
sentence.romaji: kare no kaisha ha denryoku wo kyoukyuu shite imasu
sentence.english: His company supplies electricity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokugyou

sentence.kanji: あなたの職業を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: anata no shokugyou wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me your occupation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuujo

sentence.kanji: プールで男の子が救助されました。
sentence.romaji: pu-ru de otoko no ko ga kyuujo saremashita
sentence.english: A boy was rescued in the swimming pool.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tasukaru

sentence.kanji: 彼はシートベルトをしていたので助かったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shi-toberuto wo shite ita no de tasukata n da
sentence.english: He survived because he was wearing a seat belt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sousa

sentence.kanji: その殺人事件の捜査は2年間続きました。
sentence.romaji: sono satsujin jiken no sousa ha 2 nenkan tsuzukimashita
sentence.english: The investigation of the murder case continued for two years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouzui

sentence.kanji: 洪水でたくさんの家が流されたの。
sentence.romaji: kouzui de takusan no ie ga nagasareta no
sentence.english: A lot of houses were washed away in the flood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsudo

sentence.kanji: 日本の夏は湿度が高いです。
sentence.romaji: nihon no natsu ha shitsudo ga takai desu
sentence.english: Humidity is high during summers in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimepoi

sentence.kanji: 雨の日が続いて家の中が湿っぽいな。
sentence.romaji: ame no hi ga tsuzuite ie no naka ga shimepoi na
sentence.english: When it rains for days, the whole house becomes damp.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoutsuu

sentence.kanji: 私たちは共通の趣味を持っています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha kyoutsuu no shumi wo mote imasu
sentence.english: We have a common hobby.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kumiawase

sentence.kanji: 色の組み合わせで印象が変わりますよ。
sentence.romaji: iro no kumiawase de inshou ga kawarimasu yo
sentence.english: The image changes according to the combination of colors.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyogyou

sentence.kanji: 彼らは漁業を営んでいるんだ。
sentence.romaji: karera ha gyogyou wo itonan deiru n da 。
sentence.english: They are engaged in a fishing business.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukyou

sentence.kanji: 公共の乗り物は誰でも利用できます。
sentence.romaji: koukyou no norimono ha dare de mo riyou dekimasu
sentence.english: Public transport is available to everyone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joshu

sentence.kanji: 資料は助手に預けておいてください。
sentence.romaji: shiryou ha joshu ni azukete oite kudasai
sentence.english: Please hand the materials to my assistant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyouseki

sentence.kanji: 彼の今月の業績は素晴らしいです。
sentence.romaji: kare no kongetsu no gyouseki ha subarashii desu
sentence.english: His performance this month was amazing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's namiki

sentence.kanji: 駅前の並木が台風で倒れたらしい。
sentence.romaji: ekimae no namiki ga taifuu de taoreta rashii
sentence.english: I hear the trees around the station fell over due to the typhoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsugyou

sentence.kanji: 友達のお父さんが突然失業したの。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi no otousan ga totsuzen shitsugyou shita no
sentence.english: My friend's father suddenly lost his job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bakuhatsu

sentence.kanji: ダイナマイトが爆発したんだ。
sentence.romaji: dainamaito ga bakuhatsu shita n da
sentence.english: The dynamite exploded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's abareru

sentence.kanji: 彼は悪酔いして暴れたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha waruyoi shite abareta n da
sentence.english: He was so drunk that he became violent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bouraku

sentence.kanji: 昨日株価が暴落しました。
sentence.romaji: kinou kabuka ga bouraku shimashita
sentence.english: Stock prices dropped sharply yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bouryoku

sentence.kanji: 暴力はいけません。
sentence.romaji: bouryoku ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Violence is wrong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ranbou

sentence.kanji: 人に乱暴してはいけません。
sentence.romaji: hito ni ranbou shite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You must not use violence on people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimeru

sentence.kanji: 洗濯物がまだ湿っています。
sentence.romaji: sentakumono ga mada shimete imasu
sentence.english: The laundry is still damp.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumou

sentence.kanji: お相撲さんは、みんな力持ちだ。
sentence.romaji: osumousan ha minna chikaramochi da
sentence.english: All sumo wrestlers are strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuugyou

sentence.kanji: 明日は臨時に休業します。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha rinji ni kyuugyou shimasu
sentence.english: We'll be temporarily closed tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nerau

sentence.kanji: 来年は優勝を狙います。
sentence.romaji: rainen ha yuushou wo neraimasu
sentence.english: We will aim for a victory next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senzo

sentence.kanji: 神道では先祖を大切にします。
sentence.romaji: shintou de ha senzo wo taisetsu ni shimasu
sentence.english: In Shintoism we revere our ancestors.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sosen

sentence.kanji: 犬も猫も祖先は同じ動物らしいよ。
sentence.romaji: inu mo neko mo sosen ha onaji doubutsu rashii yo
sentence.english: I hear that the ancestor of dogs and cats is the same animal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arasuji

sentence.kanji: その映画はどんな粗筋ですか。
sentence.romaji: sono eiga ha donna arasuji desu ka
sentence.english: What's the storyline of the movie?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's choudai

sentence.kanji: それ、ひとつ頂戴。
sentence.romaji: sore hitotsu choudai
sentence.english: I'll have one of those.
